product.name: result.find('span', class_='a-text-normal').text.strip()
product.price: result.find('span', class_='a-price-whole').text.strip() if result.find('span', class_='a-price-whole') else 'N/A'
product.rating: result.find('span', class_='a-icon-alt').text.strip() if result.find('span', class_='a-icon-alt') else 'N/A'
product.rating_number: result.find('span', class_='a-size-base').text.strip() if result.find('span', class_='a-size-base') else 'N/A'
